author: mturk
msg: Use Poll.maintain for removing timed out sockets. Also use remove
flag for Poll.poll to skip calling extra JNI function for common case.

author: mturk
msg: Add maintain for Poll for polling timed out sockets. Remove
thread safety flags, because this is responsibility of Java client.

author: keith
msg: [33970] backport Remy's 1.31 fix into the 5.0 branch

author: remm
msg: - Add the basis for sendfile (not used yet).
- The processor will now send the socket to the poller by itself (allows future similar use of sendfile), while the boolean will only
indicate if the socket should be closed or not.
is only used to indicate if the socket is to be closed.
